TopicTitle: There's a new video on the steam page-And 1.0 IS LIVE!

Articles.Content:
There's a new video on the steam page and no longer in Early Access - [http://store.steampowered.com/app/22020](http://store.steampowered.c)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T17:09:49Z" title="04/27/2015 05:09  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by EladDv**
Visually, that's quite a step up from previous trailers!
My, My! That is a very short link!

Confirmed.

And it features Valentine so it must be a new one.
FIXED! good luck and happy launchings!

Wait a second, the trailer features an RV delivering Val, Jeb, and Bill/Bob to the rocket.....

RV UPDATE CONFIRMED! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Steam just removed the "Early Access" warning on the store page within the last five minutes!
